extendedInfo.description: Total Recall Call Recorder for Android 14 Day Trial | No Spamware. No Ads. No Spyware. Just the Best Call Recording App on the Planet!------------------------------Now Recording Calls on the Samsung Galaxy S3 / SGSIII (root required with Jellybean devices)!------------------------------Unlike many other Call Recorders on the Market Total Recall is designed to record your call directly from the line NOT the Mic, resulting in higher quality audio on compatible devices. Many other devices that do not support this can still configure the app to record from the mic, resulting in lower quality (however useable) audio. And unlike many Ad-based or so called "Free" applications, we don't eat up precious Data or Battery Life by constantly downloading new ads, and with Total Recall you can rest assured there's no spyware or other types of malware. Killer Mobile has been building and supporting our mobile apps since 2003.--------NOTE |Galaxy S2 users (including those running ICS/4.0)  please download our Call Recorder specifically setup for the S2 here:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.killermobile.totalrecall.s2.trialGalaxy Note users go here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.killermobile.totalrecall.note.trialTotal Recall is the most Popular, Feature Packed Call Recorder on the Planet and has been since 2004. Total Recall is the ONLY Call Recording App that's been been used by literally MILLIONS of users across mutliple OS's in every country across the globe, and the only Cross Platform Compatible Call Recorder that can record calls on not only Android, but also Nokia S60, Symbian & Meego smart phones.Sure there's cheaper Call Recorders out there, but they lack the FEATURES, FREQUENT UPDATES & SUPPORT that we have to offer. Ad-Based apps kill your batter in hours & run up expensive data charges. Plus, Total Recall is one of the few Call Recorders that actually records from the LINE not the MIC (on compatible devices).Key Features------------> Manually or Automatically Send your recorded audio via Email/Gmail or upload to your Evernote Account> Smartly Named Clips include the Contact Name/Number, Date, Time & More. Easily Rename clips to whatever you want> Automatically Record Calls Or Manually Record Calls from a Notification bar> Optional Dialogs letting you know when the app is recording> Record All Calls, Incoming Calls, Outgoing Calls or only Certain Numbers or Contacts> Widget for quick recording of Voice notes (perfect for Lectures, Meetings, Classes, Memos, Reminders)> Record in AMR, WAV, MP4 & 3GPP (formats)> Play back recorded calls directly from the appWe're constantly updating Total Recall to support new devices and OS versions, adding new features (including many user requests).  Have a request? Let us know we're listening!---------------IMPORTANT NOTES---------------** Please confirm the legality of call recording in your local jurisdiction prior to use.** Not all Android devices are capable of Call Recording while others only support call recording via the Microphone, which can sometimes be improved by putting the call on speakerphone. Please test Total Recall prior to purchase** Some devices will be unable to record calls while using a Bluetooth Headset or Handsfree car kit, however an option is available to automatically NOT record calls while using a BT device.TOTAL RECALL RECORDS CALLS GREAT ON-----------------------------------> Galaxy S2 & Note> Droid Inredible 2> Samsung Galaxy S Plus, Galaxy S (running OS 2.1) Galaxy Tab (running 2.2 & 2.3), Galaxy S3> HTC Evo, Hero, Dream, Inspire, Tattoo & Others> Sony Ericsson Xperia X10 / X10 Mini / X10 Pro / X8> Sony Ericsson Xperia Pro / X12 / AnzuTotal Recall Call Recorder is Just Another Killer App by Killer Mobile (R)! Send your feedback, comments, feature requests & issues to info@killermobile.com or visit our forums at http://www.killermobile.com/forums.html

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Cannot play amr files, they seem to be either empty or broken and the app is confusing and terrible. Hasn\'t recorded anything. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Rida Amir

reviews.title: S3 sch I535
reviews.comment: Non rooted phn. Not recording. Its creating a file but the size is 0 and does not show up in the app recording list... suggestions?
reviews.author: Tony Ronquillo

reviews.title: Cannot get it work on S4.
reviews.comment: The paid version of this app says it works with the S4 and to try this free version before buying but I cannot get it to work on my Sprint S4.  It only records my side of the conversation no matter what setting I try, even option B which it said to use.
reviews.author: Richard Keller

reviews.title: This Thing is Trash. Period.
reviews.comment: It\'s over hyped and under delivers. It hasn\'t worked on any device I\'ve ever used, and I\'ve tried it on three. Their customer service sucks. Instead of answering your questions directly, they give you the run around. It\'s also not the number one call recorder. It\'s about the tenth, if you search the Play Store. This recorder sucks and the makers know it, despite lies to the contrary. Nuff said.
reviews.author: Logan Broliath

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Great app. I\'ve used a couple others that didn\'t come close to this one. It did take a while to get all the settings to where this run smooth but once I got it all dialed in, fantastic. A nice feature is the 2 week trial. I don\'t mind paying for a good app, but I\'ve had several ones that failed and I never recieved an refunds. I know this has worked flawlessly for the trial period, I\'m ready to upgrade.
reviews.author: James Hartley

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Full of bugs. I\'m so glad I never paid for it. A 3GP file continues to play even after telling it to stop. Had to reboot phone. Won\'t list any MP4 files. Have to go to the saved location and then they are all 0 bytes and corrupt. I\'m not shown any test recording. The developer has used Enguish.
reviews.author: Adrian Walker

reviews.title: Did not work
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t get this to work on HTC One S.  Could be the phone but the setup process needs a lot of work. When you run a test,  a dialog asks you if it recorded properly. I found no way of knowing the answer to that question without leaving the screen and going to Records. Once there, I found it to be empty so I  assumed that it did not work. When I went back to the test screen, it starts all over again so you cannot answer the question. Not impressed.
reviews.author: David Berthelette

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t start then once it appears started it records 0b size files. Avoid
reviews.author: Lajos Andrejkovics

reviews.title: broken, do not buy
reviews.comment: does not work on any of my phones, all output files are empty, looking at their forum it is a known problem, stay away
reviews.author: Jan Mattsson

reviews.title: GOOOD
reviews.comment: Its really good app....
reviews.author: usman ilyas

reviews.title: Doesn\'t record, crashes, interferes with other media services...
reviews.comment: Sorry folks, I wish this worked. Didn\'t do anything at all for me and just crashed and messed with audio players and streaming radio.
reviews.author: Jonny Durango

reviews.title: Which player does it run from
reviews.comment: I am struggling finding out which player shall i use running the recorded calls in amr format..
reviews.author: Ajay Pandita

reviews.comment: Very cool
reviews.author: Shahbaz Khan

reviews.title: S2&S3
reviews.comment: This software was designed to work properly for Samsung mobiles, you guys need to stop complaining and download the preferred \"call recorder\" that suits your mobile phone, i give this software 5star because it works 100 percent for my Samsung mobile phones, HTC users should stay away from this app! HTC is a buried mobile phone @euronaire on twitter

reviews.comment: It stopped working before it even recorded one call .

reviews.comment: I am learning how to make it easier for me to operate. So far so good.

reviews.comment: I bought this application last month This application does not work at all. No calls recorded at all. Simply waste of money and Time
